ai-ud8.6:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was wandering in the land of the Magadhans together with a large Saṅgha of mendicants when he arrived at the village of Pāṭali.

ai-ud8.6:14.1_0: The Buddha spent most of the night educating, encouraging, firing up, and inspiring the lay followers of Pāṭali Village with a Dhamma talk. Then he dismissed them,
ai-ud8.6:14.2_0: “It’s late at night. Please go at your convenience.”
